div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xvijmo die mensis
Septembris et cetera lxxxixo

Eodem die prepositus ballivi consules et diuersi communitatis consenserunt
et in mandatis dederunt ad sigillandum quandam cartam per Willelmum Kintor
et Isabellam sibald' sponsam suam magistro andrea liale thesaurario de abirdene de et
super dimidio Rethis de furdis suo Sigillo communi in cauda post Sigilla dictorum
Willelmi Isabelle et ballivi Datoris sasine piscatorium dicti dimidii Rethis

The quhilk day comperit in Jugement James Days warnit lauchfullie
be ane officiar to ansuer til ane borghe' strekit be george eduardson' burges
of edinburghe' apon' him in the forme as eftir follouis / Alexander allansone ane
of the seriandis of abirdene I george eduardsone as dusty futit man findis
ane borghe in thi handis that James Days procurator and pertenar with Jonhne'
schaue wranguislie lossit my gudis and merchandice out of the mary of leithe
in the hawin' of abirdene becaus' thai war frauchit be chartir party to the
hawinnis of banff and fynder and has skathit me tharthrow in thar defaltis
the Some of xx li' In the quhilkis I ame bundin' becaus' my merchandice was nocht
deliuerit in banff And als' that thai haue skathit me the some of xxiiij li' be the
selling of my salt lekage and lying heire in thar defaltis and aucht to refunde
and pay to me the saide Somes that thai haue skathit me and wrangis that thai
do it nocht and tharto ane borghe' to follow my borghe' The quhilk borghe' being'
presentit be the officiar' ande rede planly in courte the said James Days be
his forspekar thome of fyff askit ane lauchful day to ansuer' to the
saide borghe' tueching the quhilkis the partiis remouyt the court riply
ande weile awisit assignit to the said James settirday next thareftir the
xix day of the said monetht of September to ansuer' to the saide borghe'
as law will And' the said James fand' the forsaid thomas fyff Souerte to
ansuer' to the said borghe' be him self or his procuratouris the saide day be his landis
and gudis And' in likuis' the said george fand' mastir Androu cadiow souerte
be his landis and gudis to follow the saide borghe

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per thomam mar et Andream branche balliuos
eiusdem xixo die mensis Septembris Anno Domini et cetera octuagesimo nono

add.note: This marginal heading is placed on page 139.

div.p:
The quhilk day comperit in Jugement george eduardson' burges
of b edinburghe' and be his forspekar mastir Androu cadiow requirit
the ballieis to ger call James Days to ansuer' til ane borghe' strekit
be the said george the xvij day of the said monetht lik as he was orda
nit and this day assignit to him to ansuer to the samyne borghe' To the quhilkis
comperit thomas fiff procuratour for the said James Days hawand' sufficient pouer
of procuratory for him schawin producit and rede in Jugement and allegit that the saide
James suld nocht ansuer to the said borghe' sayand' he was nocht procuratour' for the saide
Jonhe schaue in that action' And' als becaus' the saide george as he allegit left and
renuncit the first contrak maid be the chartir party befor the prouest and ballieis of
edinburghe' and tuk him to preyff ane new condicion to be maid in Abirdene as was
schawin' in ane ak vndir the commone clerkis hand of edinburghe in Jugement And' for
thar caus' the said thomas allegit he acht nocht to ansuer tile the saide borghe' sayand'
it was of nane awaile and castyne in it selff And' thar wpone the saide thomas fyfe
fand' ane borghe' in the handis of Duncane straloche officiar' of abirdene that he aucht nocht
tile ansuer to the saide borghe' Ande thane in continent mastir Androw cadiow forspekar
for the saide george eduardsone recounterit the saide borghe' that the saide James Dais
acht of law be him self or his procuratour to ansuer to the said borghe' becaus' he was
personaly warnit be ane officiar to ansuer to the samyn and present personaly at the first
day and this day assignit to him to ansuer to the samyn And becaus' he schew in Juge
ment ane procuratory of the saide Jonhne' schaue to comper the xvj day of September
befor the aldirman and balyeis of abirdene or any vthir tyme and place to wyne and tyne
Ande als becaus' he was pertenar' with the saide Jonhne schaue and principale skathar
of the saide george ande his gudis as was allegit Apone the quhilkis borghe and
recounter the partiis remouyt the court riplie avisit wardit be thir personis vndir
writin sere Jonhne ruthirfurd of tarlane knicht Jonhne Wormet Williame blinsele Androw
Wintone Jonhne Westlande Alexander gray Alexander nauchtj patrik rede Robert rede and
James burnat And gaf for dome be the moutht of Jhone Williameson' dempstar
of the saide court that James Dais be him self or his procuratour acht to ansuer to
the saide borghe' becaus' the procuratory of the saide Jonhne maid to him was
producit in Jugement to wyne and tyne and als becaus' he was fundin'
pertenar with the saide Jonhne in the thingis forsaide And' tharfor fande ane borghe'
the Recounter maid be the said mastir Androw of availe and the saide borghe' strekit
be thomas fyf of nane avale The quhilk dome pronunsit and gewin and be the
moutht of the said dempstar the said thomas fyf in continent as procurator forsaid agan
callit and falsit the samyn dome sayand Jonhne Williamsone dempstar of this courte
that dome that thow has gewin agannis me is fals evile ande rottyne
in it selff And' tharto ane borghe' Duncan straloche seriand of this courte
in thi hande becaus' the saide James Dais was nay procuratour to defend'
the saide Jonhne schaue in the saide action' And als becaus' he renuncit and left
the first contrak be thar chartir party befor the prouest and ballieis of edinburghe'
and tuk to preif ane new condicion to be maid in Abirdene as is befor
expremit And' he protestit for Remed of law and for may resonnis to be gevin'
in tyme and place conuenient tharto tueching the falsing of the said dome And'
tharvpon' he askit Instrument at sere Jhon' stirueling notar befor thir witnes Dauid
menyeis aldirman sere Jhone Ruthirfurd Jhon' Wormet William blinsel Androw Wynton'
with vthir diuers' And' than in continent to follou and persew the falsing of the
said dome the said' thomas fyf band' him self his land and his gude in the
best forme according to our Soueran lordis lauys' And' in continent the said mastir
Androw askit the Rolment of this court to be gevin to the said george in forme
of Instrument and vndir the balyeis Seile And' protestit that the resonis and lawis
of the said James Days suld' be gevin to the lord chavmerlane of Scotland'
or his deputis within terme of law Ande protestit for his resonnis and defens'
to be gewin in the said matir tyme and place conuenient tharto And' tharupon' askit
Instrument of the said notar befor the said witnes

The xxv day of September the yer forsaide thir personis vndir writin that
is to say Jonhne colisone mastir Androu cadiow Jonhne Wormet Androw
culane yongar ande Alexander gray was chosin ande suorne taxtouris be the aldirman
balyeis consal and communite tile taxt ande extent the Some of tua hundretht
markis be thar aithis and conscience to pas' with the lordis for the honore
plesour and profit of our' Souerane lorde and common' gud of the Realme
tuenty peris wele bodyne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xxviijo
die Septembris Anno quo supra

the samyn day Jonhne of Kintor grantit
him borghe for Dauid lousone to Alexander menyeis for demi barrele of Sal
monde quhilk the balyeis chargit the said borghe' to pay and ger be
pait within terme of law

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quinto die mensis octoberis Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo Nono

quo die dominus Johannes ruthirfurde de terlane miles electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro Anno Instante prestito solito Juramento

Eodem die Andreas culane Willelmus blinsele Johannes menyeis et Jacobus
colisone electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno instante prestitis solitis Jura
mentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Duncanus straloche thomas
Jameson et alexander allansone electi fuerunt seriandi prestitis Solitis Juramentis
et consequent' Statutum et ordinatum fuit per prepositum balliuos consules
et communitatem quod si dicti seriandi aut ipsorum aliquis negligens fuerit in exe
cucione suj officij et inde conuictus fuerit immediate a suo officio depriuabitur et
aliis de nouo eligetur

The samyn day Williame blinsel oblist him be the fatht of his body to
content ande pay to the aldirman ande ballieis of abirdene Sextene
pundis alevin s' and iij d' of wattir maile acht be him within aucht dais
eftir fouloing Ande falyeing' tharof tile entir his persone withtin the tolbutht
thar to remane vnto the tyme he pay the saide Some

Eodem die accedens ad barram thomas rollande et protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu quinque s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Dauid prat ex aust
rali et terram eduardi tope ex boriali et cetera ad quam terram accedens nichil
reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in curia tanquam secundo die huius processus Testibus

Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus dominj Willelmj crukschank capellanj
altaris Beati Duthaici de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter
terram thome mar' ex australi et terram thome prat ex orientali vsque ad feriam
quintam proxime sequentem causa debilitatis curie

head.add: D matheus nicholsone et Andreas thome

div.p:
Eodem die continuatur Judicium processus duorum mathei nicholisone et Andree
thome capellanorum de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis cuiusdam
terre vaste Jacentis in le gastraw inter terram heredum quondam andree baxtar
ex australi et terram Johannis myle ex boreali vsque in feriam quintam proxime
sequentem causa debilitatis curie

Eodem die dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus altaris beati Duthaici
accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno'o' overwrites 'a'.o annuo redditu sex s' et
octo d' sibi et dicto altari debit' annuatim de quadam terra vasta Jacente
in le skuilhile inter terram magistri Duncanj scherar ex orientali et terram thome
meldrum ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam ex australi et terram Andree michel
sone ex boriali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos balliuos in sacculo presentauit in curia tanquam
secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo moire Willelmo brabner' et
Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die Dauid murray accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno annuo
redditu duorum s' sibi annuatim debit' de quodam orto vasto Jacente extra
le bolbrige inter terram olim Willelmi abirkirdour ex orientali ex vna et
croftum fratrum carmelitarum ex occidentali partibus ex altera ad quam
terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus testibus Willelmo murray
Duncano spens et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Religiosus vir frater Johannes penny
prior domus fratrum predicatorum ac procurator eiusdem quj protestatus fuit pro
vno annuo redditu sex s' et octo d' sibi et dicto loco annuatim debit' de
quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar
ex australi et terram thome prat ex orientali Ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Willelmo
scharpe Willelmo blicht Juniore et thoma Jameson' seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus couper et protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo redditu sex s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra vasta Jacente in superiore
parte vici Nauium inter terram Donaldi gilfillane ex orientali et terram dicti Willelmi
ex occidentali et communionem viam regiam ex boriali ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andrea muresone
philippo clerk et philippo Dunbrek seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus gregory et protestatus fuit pro vno
annuo Redditu et cetera

The said day the aldirman balyeis Consel and communite of Abirdene patronys
of Sanct peteris altar Situat' within Sanct nicholes altar kyrk of Abirdene
at the Instance of sere mathow nicholsone chaplan of the said altar confermit rati
feit and apprevit the assedacion and tak of the Inland' quhilkis was mastir Johne
levinston' pertening to the sade altar Set be the said sere mathow to Thome gardinar
and his wyf Anny for xiiij yeris eftir the tenor of the Indentur vndir thomas fyffis
Seile for the bigyne of that oyn' within the said land' and reformacion of the yird'
and bigyn' maid be the saide thomas and his wyf

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die mensis octoberis Anno
quo supra

The samyn day Jonhne Was sone to vmquhile gilbert Waus grantit
that he was conducit and hyrit with Williame of gareache to saile in his hulk
and that he walde saile and mak seruice in hir this next raise the said Wilye
ame payand him eftir the tenour of the condicion maide betuix thaim tharvpone

The samyn day Jonhne Watsone gra and Jonhne rede grantit thai war
conducit with Jonhne of culane to saile in ormvnde

the samyn day patrik rede grantit that he resauit xxxti s' gret in flandris of Jhon'
porteris the quhilk he saide he was redy to pay him he payand' him the
price of tua bollis of quhet siclik as he sald the layf of his quhet

The samyne day it was statut and ordanit be the consal that suorne cunnaris
pas' throw the haile towne ande tayst the ayle and sett the price of the
samyn for viij d' and xij d' the gallone And' that nane aile be set nor sald'
derrar' than xij and aucht d' the gallone vnto the aldirmannis hame cumyn'
vndir the pane of viii s' vnforgevine And gif it be wer thane aucht
or xij that thai sett it one ane lawar price

the samyn day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to Jonhne of fochil
to ansuer tile ane borghe' strekit apone him be alexander prat for the
wranguis' haldin' of Sevin li' gret fra him

the saide day Jonhne colisone oblist him to freithe ande keipe Williame
futhes skathtles of iij li' and xiiijor s' of Siluer deliuerit to James leys
one the behalf of Jonhne ros' baxtar And the saide James dischargit
and quiet'clamit the saide Williame of aucht barrellis of meile resavit
in the name of the saide Jonhne Ros'

the samyn day it was fundyne and deliuerit be ane assis Androw
Culane yongar talisman that Jonhne Waus sone to vmquhil gilbert
Waus is conducit and hyrit man to William of gareache and quyt of
murthou glenmaluynnis clame anent the hyring' to his schipe

The saide day murthou glenmaluyn was maide quyt be ane assise
of the fraucht of ane keyle clamyt be Jonhne fechat at the key

the saide day it was deliuerit be ane assyse Androw culan yongar
talisman that patrik baxtar sone to vmquhile Nichole baxtar sal pay
to thome of mar' thre lib' and sex s' vsual money of Scotland
for franche of certane victalis tharof the tane half in hand' the
tothir half at martymes in winter next hereftir and the said thomas
mar sale fynd' caucion and Souerte to keipe the said patrik
skathtles anent the said fraucht for Sandy vocat and al vthiris

The samyn day Jonhne fechat at the key come souerte be his hand'
to pay v s' to Jonhne of mar sone to thomas of mar' for Androw
Ros' within terme of law quhilk v s' was optenit apon the said Androw
in Jugement the said day be ane assise

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominos matheum nicholsone capellanum altaris
beati petri et quondam Alexandrum vocat capellanum altaris beati niniani Infra ecclesiam beati
nicholai de Abirdene' situati et nunc per dominum andream thome procuratorem
domini andree makbetht successoris dicti dominj Alexandrj de et super Recuperacione proprietatis
et possionis possessionis cuiusdam terre penitus vaste Jacentis Infra dictum burgum in le gastraw
Inter terram heredum quondam Andree baxtar ex australi et terram Johannis nul ex
boriali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj Redditus sex solidorum et octo denariorum
annuatim dicto capellano et altari sancti Ninianj a longo tempore debit' et non solut'
et alterius annuj redditus sex solidorum prefato matheo et altari sancti petri debit'
vnde dicti Capellani pecierunt a balliuis secundum formam suj processus precedentis
Juris et iusticie complementum Tunc curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dicti
capellanj proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre recuperarunt per defectu solucionis
dictorum annuorum reddituum et hoc ex ore Johannis Cowis Judicatoris
curie pro iudicio data fuit teste Curia

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum Willelmum crukschank
capellanum altaris beati Duthaci et procuratorem eiusdem de et super recuperacione proprietatis
et possessionis cuiusdam terre vaste Jacentis infra dictum burgum in vico
superiore ecclesie inter terram thome mar ex australi et terram thome prat
ex boreali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus quinque solidorum dicto
capellano et altari a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus
capellanus peciit a balliuis secundum formam suj processus precedentis iuris
et Justicie complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata decre
uit quod prefatus capellamus capellanus possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre legittime
recuperauit pro defectu solucionis dictj annui redditus et hoc ex ore
Johannis Cowis Judicatoris curie pro Judicio Data fuit teste curia

The samyn day thomas fyf procuratour for James Days presentit his resonis anent
the falsinge of ane dome gewin for george eduardsone quhilkis was
putt in the common' kyst to the decision' of the saide matir

Curia gilde burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvio die octobris
Anno Domini Millesimo quadringentesimo octuagesimo Nono

div.head: Consilium
div.p:
Dauid menyeis
Alexander chamer of murchile
Alexander menyeis
Robert blinsele
James of leslie
Jonhne of culane
Alexander rede
Jonhne of Knollis
Mastir Androw cadiow
Jonhne colisone
Thome prat
Jonhne Wormet
Thomas mar
Alexander chamer yongar
Androu branche
Walter auchneyff
Androu murray eldar
Williame andirsone eldar
Williame futhes
Williame Kintore
Androu culane yongar
Williame gareache eldar
Dauid mare
Robert of crage
Robert of buchane

Alexander nachty Androu philpsone Duncan smitht Thome gardiner
Jonhe' of lundoris Richerde litstar Jonhne blak Jonhne Waus
James of Kennarty Robert buchane Androu Waus William vm
fray Jonhne sanclar and Williame goldsmitht

In ewyne quartar philp Dunbrek seriand'
Williame spruty and Jonhne of cowys cunnaris
In crukit quartar Duncan straloche seriand'
Richerd talyour' and george Kerde cunnaris
In grene quartar thomas Jamesone seriande
george forestar ande philp clerk cunnaris
In futy quartar Alexander allansone seriande
Duncan henry ande Robert sleyche
